recorderSession.description: Creates a page flow containing a control by calling FlowControllerFactory.createPageFlow().

header.name: user-agent
header.value: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 6.0; Windows NT 5.1; SV1; .NET CLR 1.1.4322; InfoPath.1)

response.responseBody:
CreatePageFlow Test

This servlet creates a page flow containing a control by calling FlowControllerFactory.createPageFlow() to create a page flow outside of the usual PageFlowRequestProcessor or page filter.

Test CreatePageFlow

/miniTests/createPageFlow/Controller.jpf

This page flow is created from a servlet calling FlowControllerFactory.createPageFlow() to create a page flow outside of the usual PageFlowRequestProcessor or page filter. The servlet also initializes/uninitializes the ControlContainerContext. 


Stocks:
0 - AAAA, AAAA Systems, http://...
1 - BBBB, BBBB, http://...
2 - CCCC, CCCC Inc, http://...
3 - ZZZZ, ZZZZ Inc, http://...
